synopsis.text: For Shima Kawauchi, life takes a dramatic turn when a cherished photo of his late grandfather slips into the ocean. Overwhelmed by grief and without a second thought, he plunges into the water, only to find himself on the brink of drowning. In an unexpected twist of fate, a captivating merman comes to his rescue. Shima, feeling an immediate connection, invites the merman—whom he names Isaki—to stay with him until he regains his strength. As they spend more time together, an extraordinary bond begins to form between them, transcending the boundaries of species and gender. However, their relationship faces unique challenges as they navigate the complexities of their diverse backgrounds and identities. Will their bond be strong enough to overcome these obstacles, or will their differences ultimately drive them apart? Embark on a heartwarming and poignant journey with Shima and Isaki in "This Boy Caught a Merman."
